{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WGU624 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/15/2004 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Delta Networks |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY3WGU624 |ic_id=4054A-WGU624 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.8 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR5312A |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5312A |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR5112 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=a |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR5312A |wi2_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip2_model=AR2112 |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abg |default_ssid=NETGEAR_11a,NETGEAR_11g |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR_11a$,,,^NETGEAR_11g$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:0F:B5 |oui_eth=00:0F:B5 |default_ch= }} ''Double 108 Mbps Wireless Router''
{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=WGU624|vs_id=2599}} [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=34745 On the OpenWrt forums] "2976227701" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. Per the manual, the default SSIDs are '''NETGEAR_11a''' and '''NETGEAR_11g'''.
